pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.4_0: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.9_0: “Bahū, āvuso, saṅghassa dāyakā, bahū saṅghassa bhattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.10_0: Ime tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.11_0: Tumhe ce imesaṁ na dassatha, atha ko carahi imesaṁ dassati?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.13_0: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ datvā saṅghaṁ bhattena parivisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.14_0: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ “na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dinnan”ti te evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.17_0: Yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ ayyā chabbaggiyā ayyānaṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ pariṇāmesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.18_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.19_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.20_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.23_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.25_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.26.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.6_0: sāmaṁ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.12_0: “dassāma karissāmā”ti vācā bhinnā hoti, taṁ puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.1_0: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.2_0: Pariṇate vematiko puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.4_0: Saṅghassa pariṇataṁ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.5_0: Cetiyassa pariṇataṁ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.6_0: Puggalassa pariṇataṁ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.3.3_0: “yattha tumhākaṁ deyyadhammo paribhogaṁ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṁ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṁ cittaṁ pasīdati tattha dethā”ti bhaṇati,
